ORIGAM Documentation : GetFileSystemInfo

Created by Petr Hrehorovský on Sep 04, 2017

This method fills FileSystemInfo dataset with information on contents of selected folder.

PARAMETERS

   
PathString (Context Store Reference, Data Constant Reference)Path to folder.
MaskString (Context Store Reference, Data Constant Reference)Mask to filter files. If not filled, "*.*" is used.
RecursiveBoolean (Data Constant Reference)If true, information whole folder tree will be fetched.

Filesysteminfo fields

   
IdUnique IdentifierId of the row.
NameStringName of the file.
ParentDirectoryIdUnique Identifier

Id of the row representing parent folder.

IsDirectoryBooleanTrue if row represents folder.
FullNameStringFull path to the file/folder.
CreationTimeDatetime 
LastAccessTimeDatetime 
LastWriteTimeDatetime 
ExtensionStringUsed for files.
